lines: raat ek baje amit apane kamare mein sone pahuncha
priya ko isee samay vah yaad kar paata tha
usake patr ka smaran aaya to use likhane baith gayaah
meree pyaaree priya
dherasa pyaar
aadhee raat beet chukee hai
abhee aakar apane bistar mein baitha hoon
abhee tak dev ke kamare mein tha use khoon chadh raha hai
mai bhee baitha tha veena bhaabhee aur mammee ke paas
pichhale do dinon mein usamen kaaphee parivartan aaya hai
usakee dasha kabhee bigadatee hai kabhee theek ho jaatee hai
har dam baaba bhootanaath ko yaad karate rahate hai
aaj unhonne sandesh bhijavaaya hai
sandesh milane ke baad to vah adhik aashaanvit ho gaya hai
baaba taareekh ko aa rahe hain aur unaka yahee sandesh aaya hai ki dev ko ghabaraane kee koee aavashyakata nahin usake kasht ka nivaaran hoga
aur aise mein chup hokar apane se jo ban sake vahee karana hee behatar hai
baaba itane nishchay se kah rahe hai to koee kaaran hoga hee
isalie dhairy se dekh lenge ki kya hoga
aise hee shaanti se usaka samay beetana chaahie
dev ke sir ke tyoomar ka aakaar bhee ab kuchh kam ho gaya hai
yadi yah shubh ka prateek hai to yah sab veena bhaabhee kee tapasya ka phal hai aur dhairy mein seva bhaav mein jindagee kee keemat ko samajhane mein mainne unhen apana guru maan liya hai
jaanata hoon tum aajakal isee kaaran se udaas rahatee hogee
aise mein ham donon yadi iktthe hote to shaayad hamaaree udaasee ekadoosare kee nikatata paakar kuchh kam ho jaatee
abhee upar baitha raha to veena bhaabhee ko sula diya tha
vah kal raat bhee nahee so sakee thee
dev bhee dava kee khumaaree mein tha

aise mein khoon kee botal se nikalatee har boond ko dekhate hue kabhee deevaar kee taraph dekhata tha kabhee tumhaaree mammee kee taraph jo ungh rahee thee lekin mere baarabaar kahane par bhee nahin uth rahee theen aur kabhee tumhen yaad karata tha
meree priya mujhe bahut yaad aa rahee thee
lekin main usase abhee nahee mil sakata
isalie yahaan rahate hue bhee mai apanee priya ko adhik se adhik yaad karata rahata hoon itana yaad karata hoon ki usakee yaad meree nasanas ko meree aatma ko usake naam se trapt kar detee hai
isee ke saath
sirph tumhaara
amit
taareekh subah dev ne raharah kar ek jidd shuru kar dee
veena kaise pooree karatee usakee jidd
maan nirmala ne suna
nikat chalee aaee dev ke
bolee dev jee kaise kah rahen hai aap aapakee is dasha ko dekhate hue kaise sambhav hai
meree dasha aisee hai tabhee to kah raha hoon
dev ne phir doharaee apanee baat
aansoo usakee aankhon se tapak rahe the
veena thee ki dev ke aansoo ponchhatee lekin apane aansoo nahin rok pa rahee thee
amit maan jaega kya priya maanegee nahin kya is samay uchit lagega unhen apanee sochane kee maan ne punah kaha
meree ichchha hai meree antim ichchha
donon mujhe itane priy hai ki un donon ko main ikattha dekhana chaahata hoon
phir kuchh ruk kar bola main ab nahin rahoonga ve donon hee veena ka dhyaan rakhenge mere baad
kaisee baat kahate ho dev
tum theek ho
abhee veena pooree baat nahee kar paee thee dev ne tok diya use ab is bhram mein na raho veena ab mujhe koee nahee rok sakata
ab mujhe sirph tumhaaree chinta hai amitapriya tumhaare lie ek ho jaen meree aankhon ke saamane
dev nidhaal ho gaya
maan nirmala rone lagee
kaiseevivashata thee usake saamane
dev kee dasha ko dekhakar kuchh bol nahin pa rahee thee
dev se ladana chaahatee to bhee shabd nahin the usake paas
aur apana ant saamane dekhakar yah kalpana nahin kar pa raha tha ki usake baad usakee veena kisee aur ke saath bandh jaegee
apana ant saamane dekhakar vah apane aaj ko bhool gaya tha aur usake baad ke vishay mein sochakar apane vartamaan ke kasht ko bhoolane kee cheshta kar raha tha
maan nirmala kuchh sambhalee to bolee aaj suneeta bhee aa rahee hai usake baad bulava loongee priya ko tab aap hee priya se baat kar lena aap hee amit ko mana lena
dev ne suna aur itane se hee use tasallee ho gaee
maan nirmala ne socha din mein baaba bhootanaath aaenge unhee se praarthana karegee vahee kahenge dev ko apana hath chhod dene ko
lekin aisa nahee ho paaya
na baaba aae na hee dev ko koee rok paaya jaane se
dev chala gaya raat ko nau baje
ekek usake shareer ne glookoj va khoon lena band kar diya
dev kee saans ukhadee aur antim kshan usake haath upar uthe aur baabaabaaba kahakar dev chala gaya

jaane vaale ke man mein jo aastha janmee thee kisee doosare vyakti ke lie jise usane apane sanskaaron ke raam kee padavee dee thee jise usane apane jeevan ka rakhavaala maan liya tha vah usee raam ko smaran karata hua apana shareer chhod gaya
baaba ke tantr gyaan ne jaan liya tha ki ko dev kashton se mukti pa lega kasht nivaaran se unaka yahee taatpary raha hoga veena aur dev ka yah kashtamay saath do varsho se kuchh din upar ka tha
dev ke daahasanskaar ke baad amit ne mahasoos kiya ki mohan kumaar nirmala suneeta aur nimmee ek kamare mein band hokar kuchh vichaaravimarsh kar rahe hain
use kuchh samajh nahee aaya
jigyaasa thee lekin unake kamare kee or jaana use uchit nahin laga
lekin use adhik der prateeksha nahin karanee padee
nimmee aakar use apane saath kamare mein le gaee
kamare mein sabakee upasthiti hote hue bhee bilkul chuppee thee
mohan ne amit ko apane paas bitha liya
kuchh hee kshan pashchaat usane baat shuru kar dee amit dev ke baad veena ke prati hamaara pharj banata hai ki ham usake bhavishy ke prati kuchh nirnay karen
nirnay kaisa amit ne beech mein hee prashn kiya
usee ke lie ham vichaaravimarsh kar rahe the aur ab hamen tumhaaree sahaayata kee aavashyakata hai
tab mohan kumaar ne kaha amit se
amit ne dekha maan nirmala chaah kar bhee usase aankhen nahee mila rahee bas unakee aankhen aansuon se geelee hotee ja rahee tha
suneeta kee or dekha usane aur usake chehare ke bhaavon ko dekhakar amit ko na jaane kyon apanee dhadakan badhatee mahasoos huee
suneeta ke chehare par duhkh kee apeksha kuchh khushee ke bhaav the
jaise mohan kumaar se vichaaravimarsh karane ke pashchaat usake man se sabhee ke prati rosh samaapt ho gaya ho
tab amit ne kaha meree sahaayata main bhee to bhaabhee kee khushee ke lie pahale din se yathaasambhav prayatn karata raha hoon aur karata rahoonga
isake lie kisee ko mujhe mere kartavy ka smaran karavaana jaruree nahin
nahin aisee baat nahin hai
ham to samaaj ke dastoor kee baat kar rahe hain
dev ke jaane ke baad veena is ghar mein akelee na rahe aur hamaare ghar ka koee sadasy use apana le
mohan kumaar ne do took baat kah dee
amit ke sir par pahaad gira jaise
dhairy se socho aur soch kar hee kuchh nirnay lo
tum par koee jorajabaradastee nahin kar raha
yah baat to ham sab vichaar kar rahe the hamane to tumhaaree raay maangee hai

tab amit ne aansoo ponchhate hue kaha vichaar karane se pahale ya meree raay maangane se pahale aap log ye to sochate ki anahonee jo huee hai usako sahane kee shakti paida karanee hai hamen bhaabhee mein aur aap ek aur anahonee kee baat kar rahe hain
jise jaanatesamajhate hue aap hone hee daavat de rahe hain ek nahin teenateen jindagiyon se khalane kee koshish karana kitanee badee samajhadaaree hai
tab mohan kumaar ne kaha amit yah samay bhaavukata ka nahin sochasamajh kar kuchh karane ka hai
ham mein se koee tum par jorajabaradastee nahin kar raha
ham to yahee kah rahe hai ki samaaj mein aisa hota raha hai
aisa abhee bhee hota hai
aur yah iseelie hota hai kyonki ghar kee ijjat ghar mein hee baneedhakee rahatee hai
aur isase aage nirmala ne kaha beta tumhen apana beta to main kahtee hee hoon iseelie hak samajh kar kuchh kah rahee hoon
jaanate hai veena kahaan maanegee
jaanate hai priya bhee nahin sah paegee
us pagalee ko bhee main taiyaar kar loongee
apanee bahan kee khaatir vah bhee kurbaanee de degee
yah sunakar amit ko laga ki usaka sir ghoom raha hai
vah kuchh kahane ke lie taiyaar ho hee raha tha ki prem kamare mein aa gaya
amit ke manobhaavon ke vishay mein prem va prem ke manobhaavon ko amit kaaphee seema tak samajhane lage the
tab amit ne uchit jaana ki vah is sabase behatar prem se baat kar sakata hai
usane tab uthate hue kaha mein sabase pahale prem se alag se baat karana chaahata hoon
aur isase pahale ki koee kuchh aur baat kahata vah prem ko lekar baahar chala gaya
prem ko amit ne jaise un sabake vichaaron se avagat karaaya vah ekaek bol utha tum bhee kamaal ke ho amit
itanee betukee baat ke vishay mein sochate kee ya salaah karane kee kya aavashyakata hain isaka ek hee shabd mein upar na hai
bas aur kuchh nahin
is par amit ne kaha sirph bhaiya kahate to aur baat thee mammee aur suneeta deedee kee raay bhee usee mein thee
mammee se usaka taatpary nirmala se tha
mammee doosaron kee baaton mein jaldee aa jaatee hain aur yahee haal suneeta deedee ka hai
deedee ke lie pyaar ka koee arth nahin
ve pyaar ko bakavaas samajhatee hai aur pyaar kee bhaavanaon ko jhuthalaane ke lie hamesha pharj kee duhaee dene lagatee hain
unako to is baat mein sabase achchhee baat yahee lagee hogee ki veena ka ghar bas jaega
bas
priya kee bhaavanaon kee thaah nahee unhen
ve samajhatee hain vah jhat se samajh jaegee
prem kee baaton se amit ka man shaant ho raha tha
prem kahe ja raha tha is baat ko bhool jao aise ki kabhee kuchh tumane aisa suna hee nahin
main samajhata nahin kya ki veena deedee ko tum mujhase jyaada pyaar karate ho
priya va tumhaare pyaar kee koee seema nahin
ek naya rishta banaakar main teenateen hatyaen dev kee duhkhad ghatana ke saathasaath nahin hone doonga
vakt veena deedee ka yah ghaav bhar dega
dekh lena
mujhe to bharosa hai bhagavaan par tum par aur usake har shubhachintak par
par yah ghaav yadi laga diya to teenon ko kainsar se bhee adhik buree tarah chaat lega
tab amit prem se lipat gaya
kamare mein laut kar prem ne maan nirmala se mohan kumaar se alag jaakar dotook baat kar lee aur yah nirnay svayan pooree tarah radd ho gaya

amit ko isaka aabhaas bahut jaldee lag gaya jab nimmee bhaabhee ne usase kaha tha main aantee se ab baat karungee dev kee kriya ke baad ki amitapriya kee shaadee saadagee se doteen maheene baad hee kar denee chaahie
tab amit na chaahate hue bhee muskura pada
nirmala va suneeta ko bhee prem ne achchhee tarah samajha diya tha
tabhee agale din nirmala amit ko alag lie baithee rahee aur usake baalon mein anguliyaan phiraate hue pyaar se bolee beta tumhee par bharosa hai mujhe prem jitana
tum hee meree veena ka khyaal rakhoge
usake bhavishy ke vishay mein tum svayan kuchh sochana
main jo kuchh bhee kah gaee thee us din bhool jaana use
kabhee bhee priya se jikr mat karana is baat ka
use bhee duhkh hoga
veena sambhal jae phir ham tum donon kee shaadee kar denge
amit ko ek baat samajh aa gaee us din maan nirmala ke vichaaron ke prati ki bhaavanaon kee thaah lekar unake vichaaron ko badee aasaanee se badala ja sakata hai
lekin maan nirmala svayan kahakar bhee yah baat priya se na chhipa paee
veena ke lie rote hue sab kah gaee priya se deharaadoon pahunch kar
priya bhaavanaon se lipatee amit ko patr likhane baith gaee
mere priy amit
pyaar
mera man theek nahin
bahut jatil ulajhan mein ulajha hua man tumase kuchh kahana chaahata hai
amit kahaan se shuru karun aur kahaan is baat ka ant hoga abhee pata nahee
har cheej aaj veeraan najar aatee hai
kyon amit aisa kyon hota hai pyaar kee koee ijjat nahin karana jaanata
kya pyaar sirph pyaar nahin hota kyon sab ise keval ek bhaavana maatr samajhate hai
bas soonee aankhon se ekadoosare ko dekhatedekhate ham juda kar die gae
amit bahut dar lagata hai ab ham bebas na ho jaen hamaare sapane toot kar na bikhar jaen kaheen
amit hamaaree kismat hamen chaahe kahee bhee le jae par ek baat yaad rakhana hamesha ki tum meree najaron se jitane door hoge mera man tumhen utana hee kareeb paega
amit main likhana kya chaah rahee hoon aur likha kuchh aur hee ja raha hai jo likhana chaah rahee hoon vo likh nahin pa rahee
mera man bahut asthir hai
tum mujhe apanee chitthee mein jo kuchh nahee likh pae mainne use jaan liya hai
tum aajakal bahut pareshaan ho mujhe pata hai
haan amit isaka kaaran bhee mujhase chhipa nahee hai
bahut samajhadaar to nahee hoon main lekin phir bhee kuchh to samajhatee hoon
phir main duhkhee bhee to nahin hoon
vaheen veena deedee se milane kee ichchha rakhate hai
amit meree chinta mat karana lekin karana vahee jisake lie tumhaara dil tumhen ijaajat de
inhee bhaavanaon ke saath
sirph tumhaaree
priya
amit patr padhakar bhaavuk ho utha
vah kisee tarah udakar priya ke paas pahunchana chaahata tha
saath hee use maan nirmala par bhee krodh aa raha tha
svayan usane use roka tha priya se kuchh bhee jikr karane ko aur svayan ghar lautakar usakee bhaavanaon ke saath khilavaad karane kee koshish kee thee
amit jaldee se priya ko kuchh shabd likhakar bhejana chaah raha tha taaki naveen bhaee ke haath aaj hee priya ko usake man ka haal maaloom pad jae
